short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button to the share menu that copies a shortened link to the clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a button to the share menu of a Reddit Post that copies a shortened link to the clipboard
Example:
Normal Copy: https://www.reddit.com/r/blog/comments/k967mm/reddit_in_2020/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=web2x&context=3
Short Copy: https://redd.it/k967mm
